title: Plexus Breaks Above 200-Day Moving Average - Bullish for PLXS - Nasdaq.com
text: In trading on Thursday, shares of Plexus Corp. (Symbol: PLXS) crossed above their 200 day moving average of $57.47, changing hands as high as $60.63 per share. Plexus Corp. shares are currently trading up about 5.3% on the day. The chart below shows the one year performance of PLXS shares, versus its 200 day moving average:
